# Tables

```{r}
tab = read.csv(file.path(mod_loc, "tables", "_Catches_All_Years.csv"))
col_names = c("Year", "Recreational (mt)", "Commercial (mt)", "Total Mortality")

table_format(x = tab,
			caption = 'Removals by fleet for all model years.',
			label = 'allmortality',
			digits = c(0, 2, 2,2),
			longtable = TRUE,
			col_names = col_names,
			align = c('r','c','c','c'))
```
